LanguageData.OMC_Dominator_Shotgun.label: Mech Doom
LanguageData.OMC_Dominator_Shotgun.description: Reconstructed OMC Auto Shotgun for use by mechanoids. Rapid-fire and multiple-charge weapons with reduced damage.
LanguageData.OMC_Dominator_Shotgun.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.OTC_Dominator_MultiCannon_Acid.label: Mech Pulsar(Acid)
LanguageData.OTC_Dominator_MultiCannon_Acid.descripti: Reconstructed OTC Multi-Cannon for use by mechanoids. Balanced weapon with Acid charges.
LanguageData.OTC_Dominator_MultiCannon_Cryo.label: Mech Pulsar(Cryo)
LanguageData.OTC_Dominator_MultiCannon_Cryo.descripti: Reconstructed OTC Multi-Cannon for use by mechanoids. Balanced weapon with Cryo charges.
LanguageData.OTC_Dominator_MultiCannon_Fire.label: Mech Pulsar(Fire)
LanguageData.OTC_Dominator_MultiCannon_Fire.descripti: Reconstructed OTC Multi-Cannon for use by mechanoids. Balanced weapon with Fire charges.
LanguageData.OTC_Dominator_MultiCannon_EMP.label: Mech Pulsar(EMP)
LanguageData.OTC_Dominator_MultiCannon_EMP.descriptio: Reconstructed OTC Multi-Cannon for use by mechanoids. Balanced weapon with EMP charges.\n\nWarning! EMP damage isn't intended to destroy meatbags.
LanguageData.OCC_Dominator_Drill.label: Mech Balor
LanguageData.OCC_Dominator_Drill.description: Reconstructed OCC Drill for use by mechanoids. Slow weapon are designed to destroy structures.
LanguageData.OCC_Dominator_Drill.tools.drill.label: drill
LanguageData.OEC_Dominator_Bow.label: Mech Pride
LanguageData.OEC_Dominator_Bow.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Mech Pride
LanguageData.OEC_Dominator_Bow.description: Reconstructed OEC Bow for use by mechanoids. Extremely armor-piercing and equipped with a melee blade.
LanguageData.OEC_Dominator_Bow.tools.blade.label: blade
LanguageData.ODC_Dominator_BladeLauncher.label: Mech Harvest
LanguageData.ODC_Dominator_BladeLauncher.description: Reconstructed heavy ODC Blade Launcher for use by mechanoids.
LanguageData.OMG_Dominator_Shotgun.label: Mech Bytecrusher
LanguageData.OMG_Dominator_Shotgun.description: Reconstructed OMG Shotgun for use by mechanoids.
LanguageData.OMG_Dominator_Shotgun.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.OMG_Dominator_SniperRifle.label: Mech Etherstrike
LanguageData.OMG_Dominator_SniperRifle.description: Reconstructed OMG Sniper Rifle for use by mechanoids.
LanguageData.OMG_Dominator_Minigun.label: Mech Void Shredder
LanguageData.OMG_Dominator_Minigun.description: Reconstructed OMG Minigun for use by mechanoids.
LanguageData.OMG_Dominator_Minigun.tools.barrel.label: barrel
